Sentence.string: I’ve another question Robert. I heard that Marcus could have hidden a part of his fortune. Do you know anything about that ?
It was probably not a lot of money, given his way of life … My mother and I tried to find it, it belongs to us.
Yes, it comes down to my sister and I. Given the way he treated us, he owes it to us, at least.
Money as forgiveness. Is it your point of view ?
Call it as you want… But you must know that I could never forgive him. It’s actually more like an indemnification.
I see. The time had come for Marcus to disappear before his money does the same ?
What do you have in mind Mr. White ?
So please try to investigate on the right people.
